blocks.text: This dashboard provides an overview and details on open and overdue invoices.

Structure of the Dashboard
  Page 1 - Overview: Leading KPIs, a Process Discovery Widget and a Business Case Calculator 
  Page 2 - Impact: Overview of all Late Payments in the current data set and their impact on your ITP process
  Page 3 - Root Causes: Deep Dive into possible blockers causing late payments
  Page 4 - Take Action: A collection of ideas to tackle the drivers of inefficiencies
  Page 5 - Case Details: An exportable list of single invoices and their most important attributes that can be filtered.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.

If you feel our Dashboards helped you during your analysis, please share some feedback regarding improvement ideas, wishes, and problems. We always try to improve and extend the Dashboard Templates to provide you with the best experience possible. You can submit your feedback here.

children.name: Number of Open Overdue Invoices
children.description: Invoices that their due date is already passed

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
	AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Overdue Invoice Value
children.description: Invoices without a clearing date that their due date is already passed

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")  FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Invoices that are due in the next 7 days
children.description: Invoices without clearing date due in the next 7 days

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '7DAYS'
   )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Invoice Value that is due in the next 7 days
children.description: Value of open invoices due in the next 7 days

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
CASE WHEN (SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
    >  DURATION '7DAYS'
	)
)) IS NULL THEN  0 
ELSE 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
    >  DURATION '7DAYS'
	)
)
END
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Invoice Value
children.description: Total value of invoices without a clearing date

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")  FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
"Last PO Vendor Name" AS "Vendor"
,SUM ("Total Paid Amount In Local Currency") AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

blocks.text:
Definition:
An Invoice is considered as "Open Overdue" when it was not cleared yet, but the due date is in the past already.
"Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

children.name: Open Overdue Invoices by Purchasing Organization

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Last PO Purchasing Organization" AS "Purchasing Organization"
,SUM ("Total Paid Amount In Local Currency") AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Open Overdue Payments Overview, sorted by Invoice Amount

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Last PO Vendor Name"
--,"Last PO Company Name"
,"Inv. Company Code Text"
,"Last PO Purchasing Group"
,"Last PO Type"
,"Last PO Item Material Group"
,"Last PO Item Plant Name"
,COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Open Overdue Invoices"
,SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoice Amount in $"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6
ORDER BY 8 DESC

blocks.text: Enhancement: it would be very useful to see how many invoices we have open in total and what is the value. Also the new Metric: Percentage of Overdue Invoices would help customer to understand what is the ratio of overdues by value and nuber regarding open invoices in total ( are we in a bad position or is it not so critical value?
Enhancement: we need to add more FI specific dimensions like Document Time , Po/non-PO (you can get yoursef inspire from Cycle Time Dashboard Tab 'Deep Dives'

children.name: Payment Rate Over time
children.description: Average Time from Posting till Clearing for all Invoices, that were cleared after Net Due Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')))) AS "Invoice Clearing Date",
        
    COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
  ) * 100 AS "Paymnet Rate"
        	
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Post Invoice'~>'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

SELECT 
"Last PO Vendor Name" AS "Vendor"
,SUM ("Total Paid Amount In Local Currency") AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

blocks.text:
Definition:
An Invoice is considered as "Open Overdue" when it was not cleared yet, but the due date is in the past already.
"Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

children.name: Invoices that are due in the coming days

columnConfigurations.columnName: Last FI Invoice Item Due Date - DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"])
Last Inv. Item Due Date - DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"])

dataSource.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
"Inv. Company Code Text"
,"Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Invoice Number"
,"Inv. Fiscal Year" 
--,"Last PO Vendor Name" --TODO: change to FI Vendor name as soon as its available
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date" - DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) AS "Days until due date"
,SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoice Amount in $"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
AND "Inv. Posting Document Date" IS NOT NULL IS NOT NULL
AND "Inv. Accounting Document Number" IS NOT NULL

-- show only invoices that are due in the future
--AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0DAYS' 
ORDER BY 4 desc

children.name: Open Overdue Invoices by Purchasing Organization

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Last PO Purchasing Organization" AS "Purchasing Organization"
,SUM ("Total Paid Amount In Local Currency") AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Current status - what was the last activity

columnConfigurations.columnName: Last FI Invoice Item Due Date - DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"])
Last Inv. Item Due Date - DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"])

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) AS "Affected Invoice Volume"
,LAST(event_name) AS "Last Activity"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) AS "Days until Due"

FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
AND "Inv. Accounting Document Number" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 desc

-- TODO: exclude "due date pasesd" for all future cases. use one activity before last (line 3) with lagging/window function.

children.name: Process Inefficiencies leading to Overdue Payments

dataSource.query:
SELECT
"Inv. Company Code Text"
,"Invoice Amount in $"
,"No. of Invoices"
,"Avg. Payment Block Rate in %"
,"Avg. days from posting to due date"
--,"Automatic Invoice Posting in %"
,"Rework Rate in %"
,"Change Rate in %"
FROM
	(SELECT
	  "Inv. Company Code Text"
	  ,SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoice Amount in $"    
      ,COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") AS "No. of Invoices"
      ,AVG("Payment Block Rate") AS "Avg. Payment Block Rate in %"
	  ,AVG("Last Inv. Item Due Date" - "Inv. Posting Document Date") AS "Avg. days from posting to due date"
      ,COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER(WHERE "Inv. Creation User Type" = 'System' AND event_name MATCHES('Post Invoice'))/COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number")*100 AS "Automatic Invoice Posting in %"
      ,COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (WHERE(SELECT BOOL_OR (occurrence > 1)FROM(SELECT OCCURRENCE(event_name) AS occurrence) AS sub))/COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number")*100 AS "Rework Rate in %"
	  ,COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER(WHERE event_name MATCHES (ILIKE '%update%'))/COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") * 100 AS "Change Rate in %"
	  FROM
		  (SELECT DISTINCT
			 "Inv. Company Code Text"
             ,COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Remove Payment Block'))/ COUNT("Inv. Accounting Document Number") * 100 AS "Payment Block Rate" 
			 ,"Inv. Accounting Document Number"
			 ,"Inv. Converted USD Amount"
			 ,"Last Inv. Item Due Date"
			 ,"Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
             ,"Inv. Posting Document Date"
             ,"Inv. Creation User Type"
             ,"event_name"
             FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
		   WHERE  ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL) AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
          ) AS SUB1
		  GROUP BY 1
		  ORDER BY 2 desc
	) AS SUB2

children.name: Take Action on Open Invoices that are due soon

blocks.text:
- The below tables show invoices that are due in the next few days. On the right table, you see the last activity that was performed on the invoice.
- These tables are sorted by the "Days until Due Date" and can be exported to csv.

children.name: Invoices that are due in the coming days

columnConfigurations.columnName: Last FI Invoice Item Due Date - DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"])
Last Inv. Item Due Date - DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"])

dataSource.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
"Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Invoice Number"
,"Last PO Vendor Name" 
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) AS "Days until Due"
,SUM("Total Paid Amount In Local Currency") AS "Invoice Amount in $"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
AND "Inv. Posting Document Date" IS NOT NULL IS NOT NULL
AND "Inv. Accounting Document Number" IS NOT NULL

-- show only invoices that are due in the future
--AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0DAYS' 
ORDER BY 3 desc

children.name: Current status - what was the last activity

columnConfigurations.columnName: Last FI Invoice Item Due Date - DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"])
Last Inv. Item Due Date - DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"])

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) AS "Affected Invoice Volume"
,LAST(event_name) AS "Last Activity"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) AS "Days until Due"

FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
AND "Inv. Accounting Document Number" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 desc

SELECT
"Inv. Accounting Document Number" AS "Invoice Number"
,"Inv. Fiscal Year"
,"Inv. Converted USD Amount" AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,"Inv. Document Type Text" AS "Doc Type" 
--,"Last FI Invoice Cash Discount in USD" AS "Cash Discount Amount"
,"Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code" 
,"Last Inv. Item G/L Account Number" AS "G/L Account Number"
--,"Last FI Invoice Item Profit Center" AS "Profit Center"
-- ,"Last PO Vendor Name" --TODO:update after adjusting 
-- ,"Last PO Vendor Number"

--  all date fields
--,"Last FI Invoice Receipt Date" AS "Invoice Receipt Date"
,"Inv. Posting Document Date" AS "Posting Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Clearing Entry Date" AS "Clearing Entry Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" AS "Clearing Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Due Date" AS "Due Date"
,"Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Due Date" AS "Last Cash Discount Due Date"
-- aggregated KPIs
,AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Total Cycle Time"
--,AVG("Inv. Posting Document Date" - "Last FI Invoice Receipt Date") AS "avg time invoice receipt to posting"
--,AVG("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" - "Inv. Posting Document Date") AS "avg time posting to clearing"
,AVG("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" - "Last Inv. Item Due Date") AS "No. of days paid late" 

FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
ORDER BY 10 desc
